---
id: edit-mod
title: "Edit Mod"
description: "Edit details for a mod. If you want to update the `logo` or media associated with this mod, you need to use the [Add Mod Media](/restapi/docs/add-mod-media) endpoint. The same applies to [Mod Files](/restapi/docs/add-modfile), [Metadata Key Value Pairs](/restapi/docs/add-mod-kvp-metadata) and [Dependencies](/restapi/docs/add-mod-dependencies) which are all managed via other endpoints. Successful request will return the updated [Mod Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/mod-object)."
sidebar_label: "Edit Mod"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: restapi/docs/mod-io-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Edit Mod"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Edit details for a mod. If you want to update the `logo` or media associated with this mod, you need to use the [Add Mod Media](/restapi/docs/add-mod-media) endpoint. The same applies to [Mod Files](/restapi/docs/add-modfile), [Metadata Key Value Pairs](/restapi/docs/add-mod-kvp-metadata) and [Dependencies](/restapi/docs/add-mod-dependencies) which are all managed via other endpoints. Successful request will return the updated [Mod Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/mod-object).



:::tip

Rules engine applies here

:::

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"title":"Edit Mod Request","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"Graphics Overhaul Mod"},"name_id":{"description":"The name ID is used in the URL to identify the mod. It must be unique and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.","type":"string","example":"graphics-overhaul-mod"},"summary":{"type":"string","example":"Short descriptive summary here"},"description":{"type":"string","example":"<h2>Getting started with.."},"logo":{"type":"object","example":"@/path/to/image.jpg"},"homepage_url":{"type":"string","example":"https://www.example.com"},"metadata_blob":{"description":"Metadata that accepts any string-based arbitrary value, up to a maximum of 50,000 characters.","type":"string","example":"{\"version_sig\":\"YXJlbnQgeW91IGlucXVpc2l0dmU=\"}"},"metadata_kvp":{"description":"Key value pairs you want to add where the key and value are separated by a colon ':'.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"tags":{"description":"When providing this attribute, if the input array contains tags, they will entirely replace any existing tags assigned to the mod. If an empty array is passed, all currently assigned tags will be removed. If null or omitted, no changes will be made to the assigned tags.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":"easy"},"status":{"title":"Mod Permission Enum","description":"Status of a mod. The mod must have at least one uploaded `modfile` to be 'accepted' (best if this field is controlled by game admins, see [status and visibility](/restapi/docs/status-amp-visibility) for details).","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,3],"x-enumDescriptions":{"NOT_ACCEPTED (0)":"Not accepted.","ACCEPTED (1)":"Accepted (game admins only)","DELETED (3)":"Deleted (use the [delete mod](/restapi/docs/delete-mod) endpoint to set this status)."}},"visible":{"title":"Add Mod Visibility Enum","description":"Visibility of the mod (best if this field is controlled by mod admins, see [status and visibility](/restapi/docs/status-amp-visibility) for details).","type":"integer","default":0,"enum":[0,1],"x-enumDescriptions":{"HIDDEN (0)":"Hidden","PUBLIC (1)":"Public"}},"price":{"description":"The price of the mod.<br /><br />__NOTE:__ The value of this field will be ignored if the parent game's queue is enabled (see `curation_option` field in [Game Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-object)).","type":"integer"},"stock":{"title":"Monetization Stock Enum","description":"Maximum number of times this mod can be sold. <br /><br />__NOTE:__ Limited mods can be enforced by the parent game. The value of this field is not used if the parent game's or mod's limited support is disabled (see `monetization_options` field in [Game Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-object)).","type":"integer","enum":[0,1],"x-enumDescriptions":{"SOLD_OUT (0)":"Sold out","IN_STOCK (1)":"In stock"}},"monetization_options":{"title":"Mod Monetization Permission Enum","description":"Monetization features enabled for this mod. Add the options you want together, to enable multiple features (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,8],"x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"Access to monetization features disabled","MONETIZATION (1)":"Access to monetization features enabled by the game for this mod","MARKETPLACE (2)":"Marketplace enabled","LIMITED (8)":"Quantity of this mod is limited"}},"maturity_option":{"title":"Mod Maturity Enum","description":"Mature content found in this mod, this is only relevant if the parent game allows mods to be labelled as mature. Add the options you want together, to enable multiple filters (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,4,8],"x-enumDescriptions":{"NONE (0)":"None","ALCOHOL (1)":"Alcohol","DRUGS (2)":"Drugs","VIOLENT (4)":"Violence","EXPLICIT (8)":"Explicit"}},"community_options":{"title":"Mod Community Option Enum","description":"Community features enabled for this mod. Add the options you want together, to enable multiple features (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,64,128,1024],"example":0,"x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"None","ALLOW_MOD_COMMENTS (1)":"Allow comments on mods","ALLOW_PREVIEWS (64)":"Enable Previews (Game must be hidden)","ALLOW_PREVIEW_URL (128)":"Allow preview share-URL (Previews must be enabled)","ALLOW_DEPENDENCY (1024)":"Allow mod dependencies"}},"credit_options":{"title":"Credit Enum","description":"Credit options enabled for this mod:. Add the options you want together, to enable multiple options (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024],"x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"All the options are disabled","SHOW_CREDITS (1)":"Show credits section","ORIGINAL_OR_PERMITTED_ASSETS (2)":"Mark with original or permitted assets","ALLOW_REDISTRIBUTION_WITH_CREDIT (4)":"Allow redistribution with credit","ALLOW_PORTING_WITH_CREDIT (8)":"Allow porting with credit","ALLOW_PATCHING_NO_CREDIT (16)":"Allow patching without credit","ALLOW_PATCHING_WITH_CREDIT (32)":"Allow patching with credit","ALLOW_PATCHING_WITH_PERMISSION (64)":"Allow patching with permission","ALLOW_REPACKAGE_NO_CREDIT (128)":"Allow repackaging without credit","ALLOW_REPACKAGE_WITH_CREDIT (256)":"Allow repackaging with credit","ALLOW_REPACKAGE_WITH_PERMISSION (512)":"Allow repackaging with permission","ALLOW_USERS_TO_RESELL (1024)":"Allow users to resell"}},"sku_ids":{"description":"A list of game token pack id's to associate with the mod. This will be used to directly associate SKUs with the mod for direct purchase via USD rather than virtual currency when USD Marketplace is enabled.","type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"}}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

score.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":91},"ratings_weighted_aggregate":{"description":"Overall rating of this item calculated using the [Wilson score confidence interval](https://www.evanmiller.org/how-not-to-sort-by-average-rating.html). This column is good to sort on, as it will order items based on number of ratings and will place items with many positive ratings above those with a higher score but fewer ratings.","type":"number","format":"float","example":87.38},"ratings_display_text":{"description":"Textual representation of the rating in format.","type":"string","enum":["Overwhelmingly Positive","Very Positive","Positive","Mostly Positive","Mixed","Negative","Mostly Negative","Very Negative","Overwhelmingly Negative","Unrated"],"example":"Very Positive"},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp until this mods's statistics are considered stale.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1492564103}},"type":"object"},"skus":{"description":"SKUs with corresponding platforms that can be used to purchase the mod.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Mod SKU Object","properties":{"id":{"description":"The unique identifier for the SKU object.","type":"integer"},"sku":{"description":"The SKU for the mod at the given portal.","type":"string"},"portal":{"description":"The store (or platform) where the SKU is available.","type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}}}},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to update this mod. Ensure the user is part of the mod team before attempting the request again.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"15013":"The authenticated user does not have permission to update this mod.
